Dishes.name: Corn and fish chowder
recipe: 1 x 175g pkt rindless bacon, coarsely chopped
1 leek, pale section only, thinly sliced
1L (4 cups) Massel chicken style liquid stock
2 corncobs, husks and silk removed, kernels removed
500g white fish fillets, cut into 2cm pieces
Chopped fresh continental parsley, to serve
Fresh thyme sprigs, extra, to serve
comments: Thank you! this is a great recipe!!!

Dishes.name: Florida Clams
recipe: 48 clams such as Florida farm-raised hard clams, rinsed well
1 lb. Andouille smoked sausage sliced in coins
2 cups stock or dry white wine
3 tbsp fresh herbs basil, oregano and marjoram, chopped
comments: Thank you! this is a great recipe!!!

Dishes.name: Citrus Seafood Ceviche
recipe: Raw Halibut ,Mahi Mahi, salmon, or sea bass
comments: Thank you! this is a great recipe!!!
